summary: A mod that adds a voiced-but-glitchy Prussia to your Skyrim game!
descriptionHtml:
Watch him in action!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w7NuuOAvtAU

Feel free to edit.
This is my first time making a mod for anything.

Glitches:
 - He won\'t move around in his house
 - His eyes may not appear pink on other peoples\' computers

Requires Apachii skyhair and the base game.
I replaced the eye texture with one from Flan\'s eye pack, but I don\'t know how to convert that (sorry, I am a newb).
author: Sasha isAwesome
